summary.para: Gets a class identifier (CLSID) from the blocked list.

param.name: index
param.para: The zero-based index of the CLSID to retrieve.

param.name: clsid
param.para: Receives the CLSID at the specified index.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The index parameter is out of range.

summary.para: Searches the preferred list for a class identifier (CLSID) that matches a specified subtype.

param.name: subType
param.para: A media subtype GUID to match.

param.name: clsid
param.para: Receives a CLSID from the preferred list.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: No CLSID matching this subtype was found.

summary.para: Gets a class identifier (CLSID) from the preferred list, specified by index value.

param.name: index
param.para: The zero-based index of the CLSID to retrieve.

param.name: subType
param.para: Receives the subtype GUID associated with the CLSID.

param.name: clsid
param.para: Receives the CLSID at the specified index.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The index parameter is out of range.

summary.para: Queries whether a class identifier (CLSID) appears in the blocked list.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The specified CLSID appears in the blocked list.
The specified CLSID is not in the blocked list.

summary.para: Queries whether an Audio Compression Manager (ACM) or Video Compression Manager (VCM) codec appears in the blocked list.

param.name: dllName
param.para: The name of the DLL that implements the codec.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The specified DLL appears in the blocked list.
The specified DLL is not in the blocked list.

summary.para: Adds a class identifier (CLSID) to the blocked list, or removes a CLSID from the list.

param.name: clsid
param.para: The CLSID to add or remove.

param.name: disabled
param.para: Specifies whether to add or remove the CSLID. If the value is TRUE, the method adds the CLSID to the blocked list. Otherwise, the method removes it from the list.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Adds a class identifier (CLSID) to the preferred list or removes a CLSID from the list.

param.name: subType
param.para: A media subtype GUID to associate with the CLSID.

param.name: clsid
param.para: Pointer to the CLSID to add to the list. If this parameter is NULL, the entry associated with subType is removed from the list

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Controls the preferred and blocked filter lists.
To get a pointer to this interface, call CoCreateInstance. The class identifier (CLSID) is CLSID_DirectShowPluginControl, which is defined in the header file uuids.h.
